overview:
Dr. Marcel Reichart was born 1972 in Germany. He studied economic sciences and history in Koblenz (WHU), Lyon, Washington D.C. and Rome. During his doctorate, he acted as advisor to former German Federal Minister of Economy Dr. Otto Graf Lambsdorff.

In 2000, Dr. Reichart co-built the European media incubator Venturepark formed by Pixelpark, Goldman Sachs and TelefÃ³nica as well as its investments. Since 2002, Dr. Reichart has been with Hubert Burda Media, initially as Chief of the Publisher’s Staff and Director of Business Development. Together with Stephanie Czerny, he is Managing Director Research & Development, Marketing and Communications at Hubert Burda Media as well as co-founder and co-host of DLD.

Reichart is a former scholar of the German National Merit Foundation and a Young Leader of the Atlantik-BrÃ¼cke. In 2005, he was named a Young Global Leader by the World Economic Forum.
